tasks.task: Install a rainwater collection system for a greenhouse.
subtasks: Anchor the gutter to the Quonset hut.
Route rainwater from the gutter into a trough.
Use a T-fitting to channel water into a shunt pipe.
Drill a tiny hole in the shunt pipe for a first flush diverter.
Install a filter (e.g., nylon stocking) in the sump.
Set up a sump pump to transfer water to a reservoir.
Overwinter a stock tank water heater in the reservoir.
Connect the reservoir to the greenhouse via a pipeline.
Install an indoor reservoir in the greenhouse.
Configure a jet pump to supply water to the greenhouse.
Monitor and use the rainwater for seedling production.
